about_the_game:
Prepare for endless adrenaline-pumping action in Zombocalypse, a thrilling top-down shooter designed for casual fun! Whether you’re battling hordes of undead solo or teaming up with friends, every match is a fight for survival. Take on challenging bosses, customize your playstyle with an evolving tech tree, and carve your path to victory in this fast-paced apocalypse.

Crafted by an indie developer with a passion for arcade chaos, Zombocalypse combines intense gameplay with simple controls to deliver an experience anyone can pick up and enjoy. Sharpen your aim, upgrade your arsenal, and prove you’ve got what it takes to conquer the zombie uprising!

Features:

  • Solo & Co-op Gameplay: Play alone or with friends to tackle the zombie apocalypse.

  • Waves of Zombies: Face relentless hordes and climb the leaderboards.

  • Epic Boss Fights: Test your skills against powerful bosses.

  • Tech Tree Progression: Unlock upgrades to dominate the battlefield.

  • Indie Charm: Created with care for gamers who love casual and intense experiences alike.

Can you survive the swarm? Jump into Zombocalypse and find out!

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon violence with cartoon blood effects
